events_config.name: Entering Exiting
events_config.positive_desc: A person walking through a doorway, entering or exiting a room
negative_descs: A person standing still near a door
A closed door with no one

events_config.name: Petting Cat
events_config.positive_desc: A person petting, touching, or playing with a cat
negative_descs: A person just looking at a cat
A person and a cat in the same room but not interacting

events_config.name: Petting Animal
events_config.positive_desc: A person petting or touching an animal (like a dog)
negative_descs: A person standing near an animal without touching

events_config.name: Carrying Baby
events_config.positive_desc: A person holding or carrying a baby in their arms
negative_descs: A person walking next to a stroller

events_config.name: Walking Dog
events_config.positive_desc: A person walking a dog on a leash
negative_descs: A person and a dog standing still

events_config.name: Falling
events_config.positive_desc: A person falling down, lying on the floor, or tripping
negative_descs: A person sitting on a chair

events_config.name: Baby Crawling
events_config.positive_desc: A baby crawling on hands and knees on the floor

events_config.name: Waving
events_config.positive_desc: A person waving their hand to say hello or goodbye
negative_descs: A person with hands by their side

events_config.name: Dining
events_config.positive_desc: A group of people sitting around a dining table eating food
negative_descs: People sitting at a table with no food
A person sitting alone looking at a phone

events_config.name: Eating Cake
negative_descs: A cake on a table with no one eating
A person just looking at a cake
